it.unica.enotes
Class Note

java.lang.Object
  it.unica.enotes.Note

public class Note
extends Object

Represents each note entry and offers conversion methods from and to the JSON format.

Author:
Emanuele Alimonda, Giovanni Serra

Constructor Detail

Note

public Note(Context context)
Default constructor. Creates an empty note with an auto-generated GUID.

Parameters:
context - The current context

Note

public Note(Context context,
            String GUID,
            String title)
Constructor. Creates an empty note with a given title and GUID.

Parameters:
context - The current context
GUID - The GUID of the note
title - The title of the note

Note

public Note(Context context,
            String GUID,
            String title,
            Time timestamp,
            String text,
            String URL,
            NoteAttachment attachment,
            String tags)
Constructor.

Parameters:
context - The current context
GUID - The GUID of the note
title - The title of the note
timestamp - Last modification timestamp
text - Content (text) of the note
URL - Attached URL to the note
attachment - Attached file to the note
tags - Tags of the note, as a space-delimited string

Note

public Note(Context context,
            String GUID,
            String title,
            Time timestamp,
            String json,
            String tags)
Constructor.

Parameters:
context - The current context
GUID - The GUID of the note
title - The title of the note
timestamp - Last modification timestamp
json - A JSON object containing text, URL and/or attachment, in string form
tags - Tags of the note, as a space-delimited string

timestamp - Last modification timestamp
text - Content (text) of the note
URL - Attached URL to the note
attachment - Attached file to the note

                  String title,
                  Time timestamp,
                  String json,

Parameters:
GUID - The GUID of the note
title - The title of the note
timestamp - Last modification timestamp
json - A JSON object containing text, URL and/or attachment, in string form
tags - Tags of the note, as a space-delimited string

public boolean isLoaded()
Return the note details loaded state.

Returns:
true if details have been loaded, false otherwise

public void setLoaded(boolean state)
Set the note details' loaded state.

Parameters:
state - State to set

isDirty

public boolean isDirty()
Return the note's dirty state.

Returns:
true is the note was edited after last save, false otherwise

public void setDirty(boolean state)
Set the dirty state for a note.

Parameters:
state - Whether the note was edited after last save

setTimestamp

Set the note's last modification timestamp.

Parameters:
timestamp - The timestamp to set. It'll be set to now if it's null.

getTags

public ArrayList<String> getTags()
Get the note's tags.

Returns:
The note's tags as an ArrayList. In no tags are set, return an empty array.

Parameters:
tags - An ArrayList containing the tags to set

setTagsFromString

Set the note's tags from a string

Parameters:
tags - A String containing the tags to set, separated by spaces

getTagsAsString

public String getTagsAsString()
Get the note's tags as a string.

Returns:
The note's tags as a space-delimited String.

getSharedTmpDir

public static File getSharedTmpDir()
                            throws FileNotFoundException
Get the shared directory for temporary files

Returns:
A File representing the temporary directory
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - when the directory isn't found and can't be created

hasImageCaptureBug

public static boolean hasImageCaptureBug()
Check if our current device has some _well documented_ bug (why don't they just fix it and be done with? Nope, it's better to have devs cope with it, hooray), as per http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=1480 (Oh my, it's over three years old.)
